name: ayvazyan10/imagic
description: Imagic is a Laravel Nova field package that allows for image manipulation capabilities, such as cropping, resizing, quality adjustment, and WebP conversion. It utilizes the powerful Intervention Image class for image manipulation.

suggest.ext-imagick: Install the Imagick extension to process image using ImageMagick.
suggest.ext-gd: Install the GD extension to process images using GD.
suggest.ext-exif: Install the exif extension to orientate images automatically.
